name: Toto in the space
description:
Help Toto to take off! Move the fuel barrels and drop them onto the spaceship. This activity is not so easy: different objects are flying over your place. Try to destroy them as much as you can.
When the spaceship is fully loaded then you can enter into the cockpit and take off....
Give a comment with your highest score :).  Have fun!

Note:  This game was inspired by an old Sinclair ZX Spectrum classic from 80's : it's Jet Pac.

Controls :

You can play with a gamepad or keyboard :
Movement
Fire
